title: Settting Up
text: Begin by setting up the coefficients. Write k and the coefficients.\n##figure1.gif##
speech: Begin by setting up the coefficients. Write k and the coefficients.\n##figure1.gif##
pacedSpeech: Begin by setting up the coefficients. Write k and the coefficients.##figure1.gif##

title: Beginning the Division
text: Bring down the lead coefficient. Multiply the lead coefficient by k.\n##figure2.gif##
speech: Bring down the lead coefficient. Multiply the lead coefficient by k.\n##figure2.gif##
pacedSpeech: Bring down the lead coefficient. Multiply the lead coefficient by k.##figure2.gif##

title: Finishing the Division
text: Continue by adding the numbers in the second column. Multiply the resulting number by k. Write the result in the next column. Then add the numbers in the third column.\n##figure3.gif##
speech: Continue by adding the numbers in the second column. Multiply the resulting number by k. Write the result in the next column. Then add the numbers in the third column.\n##figure3.gif##
pacedSpeech: Continue by adding the numbers in the second column. Multiply the resulting number by k. Write the result in the next column. Then add the numbers in the third column.##figure3.gif##

title: Answer
text: Our result is $$5x+12$$. There is no remainder.
speech: Our result is , 5 x plus 12, . There is no remainder.
